subject: SSN5848
description_text:
Respected title!

I am enquiring how it can be transported when from my order?

order date jan. 7

Zsolt

conversations.body_text: Hi zsolt farkas,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Semmi gond, köszönöm a frissítést.

service@simsonn.com
Hi zsolt farkas,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
